mapper.select: select t3.function_config_mobile_id as functionConfigMobileId, t3.customer_id as customerId, t3.emp_id as empId, t3.function_id as functionId, t.function_name as functionName, t2.image_add_url as imageUrl from dim_function t inner join exp_function_mobile t2 on t.customer_id=t2.customer_id and t.function_id=t2.function_id INNER JOIN function_config_mobile t3 on t.customer_id=t3.customer_id and t.function_id=t3.function_id where t.quota_or_fun = 1 and t.function_parent_id !="" and t3.emp_id=#{empId} and t.customer_id = #{customerId} ORDER BY t3.show_index,t3.create_time

select t.customer_id as customerId, t.function_id as functionId, t.function_name as functionName, t2.image_add_url as imageUrl from dim_function t inner join exp_function_mobile t2 on t.customer_id=t2.customer_id and t.function_id=t2.function_id where t.quota_or_fun = 1 and t.function_parent_id !="" and NOT EXISTS( SELECT a.function_id from function_config_mobile a where t.customer_id=a.customer_id and t.function_id=a.function_id and a.emp_id=#{empId} ) and t.customer_id=#{customerId} ORDER BY t.full_path
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO function_config_mobile ( function_config_mobile_id, customer_id, emp_id, function_id, create_time ) VALUES( #{dto.functionConfigMobileId}, #{dto.customerId}, #{dto.empId}, #{dto.functionId}, #{dto.createTime} )
